component_summary.name: LinkPropertyEditor
component_summary.description: Dialog to edit a link's predicate/property and label. Offers autocomplete from availableProperties and persists selection via onSave callback. Also renders source→target summary using computeTermDisplay for friendly labels.

props: open, onOpenChange, linkData, sourceNode, targetNode, onSave(propertyType, label)
behaviors: Initializes selectedProperty from linkData (supports multiple shapes).
Provides format for source→target display label using computeTermDisplay with rdfManager if available; otherwise falls back to shortLocalName.
handleSave invokes onSave with chosen URI and label.
notes: Simple presenter/editor relying on ontologyStore and utils/termDisplay.
Ensures multiple linkData shapes are supported (top-level vs nested data).
